testcase.name: Check the ability to find results with Car hire search gadget
testcase.system-out: Given I am on SuperHomePage.................................................passed When I click on the superHomePageElement 'carHireFormButton'................passed And I fill superHomePage form by 'minimumCarHireProfile' profile............passed And I click on the superHomePageElement 'carHireSearchButton'...............passed And I wait for page absolutely load.........................................passed And I wait for all providers load...........................................passed Then I am taken to the CarHireResults page..................................passed Then I click on the '1'st element of 'viewDealButtons' group................passed When I switch to another handle.............................................passed Then I am taken to the page contains URL 'http://www.sit1.gb.travelsupermarket.com/beta/en-gb/interstitial'.passed When I am automaticaly redirected...........................................passed Then I am taken to the page contains URL 'www.arguscarhire.com/'............passed
